```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## LG 트윈스 홈 평균 관중 1982~2018

#### MBC 청룡시절을 포함해 LG 트윈스 홈 평균 관중 변동 추이를 살펴봤다. 

```{r KBO_attendance}
KBO_attendance %>% filter(cate == "mean", team == "LG")
```

## Including Plots

```{r KBO_attendance, echo=T}
ggplot(data = KBO_attendance %>%
         filter(cate == "mean", year >=1982, team == "LG"), aes(x = year, y = num, color = team)) +
  geom_line() + geom_point()
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
